lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Maximum export earnings would be achieved by orderly marketing of traditional amounts, thus re-establishing Brazil's market share after last year's unusually low exports of 9.9 mln bags, enabling it to rebuild stocks and maintaining cordial relations with the producer group which backed Brazil's stance at the ICO talks, they added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: With little expectation of other sales incentive mechanisms such as discounts, bonuses and price fall guarantees being introduced, the level of the quota will be decisive in determining the competitiveness of Brazilian coffee on world markets, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brazil's present foreign trade and payments problems mean there are pressures from the government to boost exports to maximise foreign exchange earnings.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Maximum export earnings would be achieved by orderly marketing of traditional amounts, thus re-establishing Brazil's market share after last year's unusually low exports of 9.9 mln bags, enabling it to rebuild stocks and maintaining cordial relations with the producer group which backed Brazil's stance at the ICO talks, they added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: With little expectation of other sales incentive mechanisms such as discounts, bonuses and price fall guarantees being introduced, the level of the quota will be decisive in determining the competitiveness of Brazilian coffee on world markets, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brazil's present foreign trade and payments problems mean there are pressures from the government to boost exports to maximise foreign exchange earnings.
